alert.note: Alert for De Baca; Guadalupe (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 01 at 4:27PM MDT until May 01 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albuquerque has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern De Baca County in east central New Mexico... Southeastern Guadalupe County in east central New Mexico... * Until 515 PM MDT. * At 427 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Yeso, or 24 miles west of Fort Sumner, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Sumner, Yeso, Sumner Lake State Park and Sumner Lake. This includes Highway 60 between Mile Markers 298 and 326. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
